headline.main: The Crop of Wild Oats Was Carefully Sown

lead_paragraph: The number of wars that are being fought within and under cover of the great war multiplies every day. This does not refer simply to the revolts boiling up all over Europe or to the tremors to be observed in nearly every part of the globe if one follows closely the little items of news that occasionally find their way into print from places like Borneo, Afghanistan and Saudi Arabia.
abstract: A O McCormick on German responsibility for Eur factional strife and German econ stranglehold on Eur
